Deprecated features

This appendix describes features of Intel® Threading Building Blocks (Intel® TBB) that has been deprecated. This functionality will eventually be removed in the future.

Note

Support for C++98/03 is deprecated. Please use the compiler that supports C++11 features at least.

If supported, the compilation warnings are enabled for the deprecated functionality in accordance with the table below.

TBB_SUPPRESS_DEPRECATED_MESSAGES macro controls which warnings are issued. The following table describes the possible values:
Value Verbosity level

undefined (default)

Warnings are issued for each included deprecated header file and for each used deprecated interface that is not declared in header file.

0

Warnings are issued for each used deprecated interface.

1

All warnings related to deprecated content are suppressed.
